title: Cycling
description: Cycling allows a player to pay the cycling cost on a card and discard that card to draw a new one.

title: Keyword Counters
description: Keyword counters, like +1/+1 counters live on a permanent. Any permanent with a keyword counter is given that keyword ability.

title: Mutate
description: Mutate is an alternate cost that allows you to cast a card for its mutate cost on top or underneath target non-human creature. This will result in the creature card on top with all the abilities of the creatures below.

title: Companion
description: You may have up to one companion per game. A companion card will list a deck building requirement for your deck, if satisfied the companion card will live in your sideboard and be cast-able once during the game. Casting a companion follows all normal rules for casting a creature.
